results.content: The speaker's accent causes me to rewind and review more frequently than I would wish.  We spent a lot of time templating files, once you understand the concept, I am not sure we need to see every edit.
results.content_html: The speaker's accent causes me to rewind and review more frequently than I would wish. We spent a lot of time templating files, once you understand the concept, I am not sure we need to see every edit.
